Terrorsaur:





"Let's just see," Terrorsaur said to Drillbit. He hovered and fired into the 
dark waters. The shot richocheted back to him, nearly hitting him in the leg 
if he hadn't moved. He looked down.

"It's solid," he said. He lowered down and stood on top of the water. It was 
only an inch deep. He stomped his foot twice.
